title: put dropout states on the input device
body_html: Fix for #7280. Probably actual bindings in aten should have asserts that all the inputs and dropout states are on the same device, @ezyang if you can point me to a place where you are doing these checks, which at a quick glance I was not able to find, I'd add assert for dropout states in there, if there is no such place, I think it makes sense to add these checks.
